episode_event_general_summer_2021/6701_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you ready for summer?!

Calm down, Gloria. Look how gobsmacked
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is.
Sorry! I’m just so happy to see you!

Sorry ’bout that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Actually, we’ve been lookin’ for you.

Yeah! Marnie and I are going to open a pop-up
eatery on the beach!

I’m not as keen on the idea, what with it bein’ so
hot outside...but Gloria really wants to do it.

That’s why we were looking for you—because
we need your help!

We have permission from Sawyer to set up shop,
so all we need now is a few more people to help
us out!

If you’re OK with joining our team, come find us
at the beach!
Yeah... If you can, come help us out a bit.
We hope to see you there!
episode_event_general_summer_2021/6801_1:
Our beachside pop-up
eatery, Dine-A-Max, is
open for business!

Summer is the perfect time to visit the beach! And
if you go to the beach, you’ve got to have food!
You’re way too excited about this, Gloria...
But I guess it could be fun. Let’s do it!
